basics.name: Kiana Tangonan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2025.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Provide wine and sake service, Demonstrate in-depth knowledge of 40+ food items and 20+ alcoholic beverages
Manage Tables and provide attentive service to 50+ customers per shift, resulting in customer satisfaction
Demonstrate in-depth menu knowledge, memorize 30+ items for personalized recommendations
Craft drinks for 100+ customers per shift to ensure customer satisfaction,
Manage 100+ customers, provided attentive service while overseeing 14+ tables every shift
Manage the sororities social media and in charge of promotion/advertisement, resulting in 20 new members to our current membership
Advocate for our sororities mission and core values, which are Leadership, Community, Knowledge, & Sisterhood
Collaborate with executive board members to create 4-5 posts and reels each week, using Canva or Adobe Softwares
Take and edit 200+ digital photos for the sorority per every social event, fundraiser, and community service event
